original_title: Dixie Chicks: An Evening with the Dixie Chicks
overview: An Evening with the Dixie Chicks is a 2002 live music documentary featuring the Dixie Chicks and directed by Joel Gallen. It was filmed over two nights at Hollywoodâ€™s Kodak Theatre and features songs from the band's albums Home, Fly and Wide Open Spaces.
title: Dixie Chicks: An Evening with the Dixie Chicks
